column2: online <- read_excel(here("data", params$year, month, paste("Week", params$wk, sep = ""), "online.xlsx"))
#Rename columns, mutate columns to perform calculations

select(WeekStart, WeekEnd, `WM Week`, `Store Nbr`, `BRAND_NAME`, `CATLG_ITEM_ID`, `WM_ITEM_NUMBER (Dotcom)`, `Item Flags`, WUPC, `Net Units`, `POS Sales`, `Return Units`, `Curr Str On Hand Qty`, `Curr Instock %`, `Curr Str On Order Qty`, `Curr Str In Transit Qty`)%>%
rename(`Total Customer Item Return` = `Return Units`)-> online_clean
